content.description: Been a contributor and mentor of Mozilla since 2014.

Been added to the top contributor list of Firefox.
Type “about:credits” on the urlbar of any Firefox browser.
Alternatively visit: this page.

Got some awesome vouches on my mozillian profile as a
recognition of my contribution.
